documentation.xlink:title: USGS Coastal and Marine Program Time Series Data

attribute.name: project

attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: This experiment was designed to investigate the ocean circulation and sediment transport dynamics in the nearshore area around Diamond Shoals NC.
